result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Bobby Joe Maben

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Bobby Joe Maben appeared by video.  Attorney Nicholas John Conrardy appeared by video for Bobby Joe Maben.  Prosecuting attorney Jacob A. Maule in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defense is requesting final pretrial and jury trial dates. Case is adjourned to 11-9-22 at 8:30 am for final pretrial and 11-16-22 at 8;30 am for jury trial.
Final pre-trial scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Jury trial scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Bobby Joe Maben in court.  Attorney Nicholas John Conrardy appeared by video for Bobby Joe Maben.  Prosecuting attorney Michael J. Odden in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defense in need of discovery and an offer. Parties are requesting a status conference.  Case is adjourned to 10-12-22 at 1:30 pm for status conference, by zoom.
This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Status conference scheduled for October 12, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Status conference scheduled for October 12, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
This case was set for a pretrial conference on 9-2-22 at 8:30 am in Judge Havas court.  Br. 10 is down on 9-2-22. New court date will be 9-1-2022 at 8:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with GRW (DOB 3/22/61); GAG (DOB 8/31/60).
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Bobby Joe Maben in court with attorney Nathan Francis Opland-Dobs.  Defendant Bobby Joe Maben in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Bobby Joe Maben appeared by video means with Attorney.   Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10. On State's motion, court amends "Use of a Dangerous Weapon" enhancer to 939.63 (1) (a). Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty. DEFENDANT IS NOT INDIGENT.  
This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
